greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: matrix inverse of A110877.
comment: A110877 can be generated from M^n * [1,0,0,0...] where M = an infinite tridiagonal matrix with 1's in the super and subdiagonals and (1,3,3,3...) in the main diagonal.
Up to signs the same as A124037. - _R. J. Mathar_, Sep 06 2013
